1: @@//gnas//sra ba'i sind+ge zhub pa med //kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'//gzi brjid phreng ldan blta na sdug /pod bzang 'bar ba dapal gyi ba'u//snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'od/
2: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste//zug ru 'byin pa bla na med//sman rnams ma lus ldon pa'i shing//nyon mongs nad kyi dgra che ba // sug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor
3: can//phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa//chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng//'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste // byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang
4: phyug /khyab bdag chen po rin ced gdugs//sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che//sangs rgyas kun bdag da ngos po 'dzin//sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byog che//sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig//
5: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste//'jig rten dbang phyag kun gyi bdag /rdo rje kun 'cang mnga' bdag ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs cshe ba//sangs rgyas kun
6: gyi thugs la gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi mtso dang ldan//rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od//chags bral dang po chags pa che//kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i
7: 'od//rdo rje skyil dkrung rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes//kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzi pa// rgyal bo sgya 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang
8: /che b sangs rgyas rig pa 'chang//rdo rje rnaon po ral gri che//rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog / theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod//mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos//rdo rje zab mo dzo ni dzig /rdo rje blo gros
